sys_script_include.name: ISS

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_dd3682621bc61d10d806dc23b24bcbc0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_snc_slackerbot.ISS</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ISS</name><script><![CDATA[var ISS = Class.create();
ISS.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	get_coords: function(){
		var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
		rm.setEndpoint('http://api.open-notify.org/iss-now.json');
		//rm.setLogLevel('all');
		
		var response = rm.execute();
		var response_body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
		return response_body;
	},
	
	get_location: function(iss_lat,iss_long){
		var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
		rm.setLogLevel('all');
		rm.setEndpoint('https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/geocode/json?latlng=' + iss_lat + ',' + iss_long + '&key=' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_slackerbot.maps.token'));
		
		var response = rm.execute();
		var response_body = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
		return response_body;
	},
	
	get_image: function(iss_lat,iss_long){
		return 'https://maps.googleapis.com/maps/api/staticmap?center=' + iss_lat + ',' + iss_long + '&zoom=3&size=200x200&markers=color:blue|' + iss_lat + ',' + iss_long + '&key=' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_slackerbot.maps.token');
	},

    type: 'ISS'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>earl.duque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-09-23 06:12:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>dd3682621bc61d10d806dc23b24bcbc0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ISS</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SlackerBot" source="x_snc_slackerbot">b02cf9e61b861d10d806dc23b24bcb3f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SlackerBot">b02cf9e61b861d10d806dc23b24bcb3f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dd3682621bc61d10d806dc23b24bcbc0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>earl.duque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-12 16:28:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
